Texts.Eng:
The reclusive Carakinox have only very recently gotten into space travel, their nature and interests usually frowned upon by others.

  Diet: Omnivorous

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Defense: +^green;2^reset;, ^green;1^reset;% Health Regen
  -^green;25^reset;% Hunger Rate
  Resist: ^green;50^reset;% Shadow, Ice, ^green;25^reset;% Electric
  Immunity: Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Bone and Flesh biomes: Energy x^green;1.3^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Wands/Staffs: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Defense x^green;1.15^reset;.
  Living Weapon, Bioweapon: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;.

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.9^reset;
  Resist: -^red;75^reset;% Fire
  ^red;Doesn't like Liquids^reset;: Defense x^red;0.75^reset;
